entry.title: Personal Blog: Different Losses of Test Time Adaptation Methods

link.title: Personal Blog: Different Losses of Test Time Adaptation Methods

entry.content:
There are some important losses which often used or can be used in Test Time Adaptation. This is one of my personal blog, created when I was a Research Assistant in ccds.ai

Notes: Link to the pdf

entry.title: Paper Review - Adversarial Attacks in Test Time Adaptation Methods

link.title: Paper Review - Adversarial Attacks in Test Time Adaptation Methods

entry.content:
Review of the Paper: Uncovering Adversarial Risks of Test-Time Adaptation
Paper Link: arXiv:2301.12576

Review of the Paper: MedBN: Robust Test-Time Adaptation against Malicious Test Samples
Paper Link: arXiv:2403.19326

Review of the Paper: R.I.P. : A Simple Black-box Attack on Continual Test-time Adaptation
Paper Link: arXiv:2412.01154

I had the opportunity to present this paper in our CCDS Lab at IUB, which led to a thought-provoking discussion with lab members and my supervisors on the paperâ€™s methodology and its implications in advancing distribution adjustment research. Below, I am sharing the presentation slides for those interested.

Presentation Slides: Link to slides
